Developer Terms of Use
des: Welcome to the transformative world of Kingdom Awareness Radio, your premier destination for faith-based inspiration and Christian music. Our Alexa skill is your key to a radiant spiritual journey. Immerse yourself in a vast library of uplifting songs, thought-provoking sermons, and motivational talks, carefully curated to elevate your spirit.

The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
